                     throws javax.mail.MessagingException,

        Parses Message and extracts all data for the received message.

      • processPart

        protected void processPart(javax.mail.Part part)
                    throws javax.mail.MessagingException,
                           java.io.IOException
        Process part of the received message. All parts are simply added to the ReceivedEmail, i.e. hierarchy is not saved.
        Parameters:
        part - Part of received message
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an error with the content.
        javax.mail.MessagingException - if there is an error.

      • parseContentId

        protected static java.lang.String parseContentId(javax.mail.Part part)
                                          throws javax.mail.MessagingException
        Returns the Content-ID of this Part. Returns null if none present.
        Parameters:
        part - Part the Part to parse.
        Returns:
        String containing content ID.
        Throws:
        javax.mail.MessagingException - if there is a failure.
        See Also:
        MimePart.getContentID()
